name: Not My Junk!
description:
This is "Not my Junk"

A game about getting rid of your Junk and just give it to the other crabs. Its their problem what they do with it.

  • No Player (just watch them bots fight)
  • Singleplayer
  • Local Multiplayer (same keyboard)
